title: Across The Centuries
body:
• Time and date: Saturday, September 28, 2019 at 8:00 PM
  • Artists: Louise Schulman, viola, cittern, viola d’amore and William Zito, guitar, lute
  • Works by Bach, Dowland, Piazzolla and others
  • Concert location: Orchard Barn of Old Westbury Gardens
  • Compositions that span various musical styles using period musicals instruments.
footer: Please note that there will be no house/garden tour for this event

title: Art of the Cello
body:
• Time and date: Saturday, April 4, 2020 at 8:00 PM
  • Artists: Eleanor Valkenburg, soprano, Eugene Moye, cello, and Natasa Mitrovic¸ piano
  • Works by Faure, Franck, Debussy and others
  • Concert location: Red Ballroom of Old Westbury Gardens
footer: A tour of the House will be conducted at 6:45 pm</br>A pre-concert talk at 7:30 pm

title: Viva España
body:
• Time and date: Saturday, May 2, 2020 at 8:00 PM
  • Artists: Jesus Reina, violin, Anna Margrethe Nilsen, violin, Hayk Arsenyan, piano
  • Works TBA
  • Concert Location: Red Ballroom Old Westbury Gardens
footer: A tour of the House will be conducted at 6:45 pm</br>A pre-concert talk at 7:30 pm
